author: jeremias
msg: Fixed a performance problem and an unclosed InputStream in case of an IOException.

author: nick
msg: XWPF paragraph improvements - Make XWPFParagraph make more use of XWPFRun, and less on internal StringBuffers. Also improve handling of Hyperlinks inside XWPFParagraph objects through XWPFHyperlinkRun

author: dogacan
msg: NUTCH-904 - "-resume" option is always processed as "false" in FetcherJob. Contributed by Faruk Berksöz.

author: kelvingoodson
msg: TUSCANY-3677 pom updates to match recent server side reorg of launcher projects
